content:
Here are some must-see museums in London and information on their free admission days (if available):

1. British Museum - Free admission every day
2. National Gallery - Free admission every day
3. Tate Modern - Free admission with some paid exhibitions
4. Natural History Museum - Free admission every day
5. Victoria and Albert Museum - Free admission every day
6. Science Museum - Free admission every day
7. Museum of London - Free admission every day
8. British Library - Free admission every day

Please note that the above information is subject to change, so it's always best to check the museum's website for the most up-to-date information on admission policies and prices.
